ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisRegulations Amending the PROHIBITION OF CERTAIN TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 2005 (2-METHOXYETHANOL, PENTACHLOROBENZENE AND TETRACHLOROBENZENES) by adding 2-methoxyethanol, pentachlorobenzene and tetrachlorobenzenes to the list of prohibited substances.
